subject: Avalanches
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Some of the mitigation techniques used by a team of experts devoted to avalanche prevention at Rosa Khutor, the newly built resort that will host the Alpine skiing and snowboarding events at the 2014 Winter Olympics in February.
snippet: Some of the mitigation techniques used by a team of experts devoted to avalanche prevention at Rosa Khutor, the newly built resort that will host the Alpine skiing and snowboarding events at the 2014 Winter Olympics in February.
